bug.short_desc: Ask to googleapis or similar to include a js low level build

long_desc.thetext: A server to delivery qooxdoo low level script minified and gzipped like googleapis. jQuery and others have it for a while. e.g.: http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3/jquery.min.js

Would indeed be an option when there's an official package of a such a low-level library. Its scope has still to be determined and a number of issues need to be resolved, though. Alex, keep this on radar.
Do we already have such a library or plan to build one?
The low-level library won't make it into the next release, so let's move this issue to 1.5

That should be done right after the 2.0 release.
Here are some resources: http://cachedcommons.org/
As far as I have seen, you need to open up an issue at google code to include it to the google API like the following issue: http://code.google.com/p/google-ajax-apis/issues/detail?id=299

As for google, I haf found the following information in the already linked bug report:
In order for us to consider adding a library to our API, that library must ... (thanks comment 49!)... basically get tens of millions of loads per day across millions of websites. Due to the details of how browser caches work, hosting on our CDN really only benefits the web for libraries that are literally all over the place.
So opening a bug in there for qx.Website does not make much sense at the moment.
Added an issue at http://cachedcommons.org/ to add qx.website: https://github.com/viatropos/cached-commons/issues/73
Another good alternative might be http://www.cloudflare.com/
We could also use this one: https://github.com/cdnjs/cdnjs
We should make sure the 2.1 release lands on cdn.js
Just a reminder... if that will become a recurring post release process task, we should add a hint to our 'how to build a release' manual page.

Added a test pull reuest to cdn.js with qooxdoo 2.0.3. https://github.com/cdnjs/cdnjs/pull/564
I will add 2.1 as well as soon as everything is ok with the 2.0.3 release.

That was fast. The 2.0.3 version has already been included. Filed another set of pull requests
2.1 (min and non min): https://github.com/cdnjs/cdnjs/pull/568 2.0.3 non minified: https://github.com/cdnjs/cdnjs/pull/569

Both pull requests have been accepted. Also added a reminder to the manual for further updates.
